text.content:
Crushed Intestines

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Wounded]{Wounded 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until it is no longer wounded.

Bludgeoning

Lodged in the Bone

Crit Effect: The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success].

Piercing

Severed Spine

Crit Effect: The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude] or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed} until healed.

Slashing

Psychic Overflow

The target takes [[/r 1d8[mental]]] damage.

Bomb or Spell
